players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I didn't kill Alice. I was in the kitchen. Charlie, maybe you're not who you say you are."
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafia. Bob's alibi is solid."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Alice was killed, so Bob is the killer."
Diana: "Charlie, you said Bob is mafia, but Bob is the only other villager. You also said Alice was killed, implying Bob killed her. That contradicts Bob's alibi. I think you're mafia."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Alice was killed, so Bob killed her. Diana, your claim that I am mafia is false. Vote Bob."
You: "I was in the kitchen, didn't kill Alice. Charlie's claim is false. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice. I was in the kitchen. Charlie, maybe you're not who you say you are."
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafia. Bob's alibi is solid."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Alice was killed, so Bob is the killer."
Diana: "Charlie, you said Bob is mafia, but Bob is the only other villager. You also said Alice was killed, implying Bob killed her. That contradicts Bob's alibi. I think you're mafia."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Alice was killed, so Bob killed her. Diana, your claim that I am mafia is false. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I was in the kitchen, didn't kill Alice. Charlie's claim is false. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
